Tel Aviv.title: Tel Aviv
Tel Aviv.summary:
Tel Aviv (Hebrew: תֵּל אָבִיב‬, [tel aˈviv], Arabic: تل أَبيب‎) is the second most populous city in Israel – after Jerusalem – and the most populous city in the conurbation of Gush Dan, Israel's largest metropolitan area.
 Located on the country's Mediterranean coastline and with a population of 438,818, it is the financial and technological center of the country.
